mil7.5.7:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil7.5.7:0.2_0: The account of the fault-finding mind
mil7.5.7:0.4_0: she was confident in her feet.
mil7.5.7:1.1_0: “Are you able to take three things that should be cultivated?”
mil7.5.7:1.2_0: “Great king, all of the night, in the open air by day.
mil7.5.7:1.3_0: In the same way, great king, staying in the open by day and in the open by night.
mil7.5.7:1.4_0: This is the first herd of deer.
mil7.5.7:2.1_0: When the Buddha has spoken, great king, the gods of the Buddha,
mil7.5.7:3.1_0: And on days such as the cold spell when the snow falls in the dead of winter, I stayed in the open by night and in the forest by day.
mil7.5.7:3.2_0: But in the last month of summer I’d stay in the open by day and in the forest by night.’
mil7.5.7:4.1_0: Furthermore, when a deer falls into a snake, a spear, or a pit, they don’t fall into the body.
mil7.5.7:4.2_0: In the same way, a cow with a child, you should smeared with dung, and throw them out, and you should not shake mind.
mil7.5.7:4.3_0: This is the second herd of deer.
mil7.5.7:5.1_0: Furthermore, because of a human being, they saw me by execution or by that.
mil7.5.7:5.2_0: In the same way, a great king, who enjoys company with the goods of possessions, honor, and popularity, but he saw me that they haven’t seen.
mil7.5.7:5.3_0: This is the third herd of deer.
mil7.5.7:5.4_0: When you have spoken, great king, you’re in accordance with the Teaching,
mil7.5.7:6.1_0: ‘When will I have nothing to do with those of bad wishes,
mil7.5.7:7.1_0: is the seventh factor of fish.
